articles.title: MG ZS getting update to fix performance issue
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: MG has updated the ZS Hybrid+ model, which started rolling out in mid-December 2024. The update applies to both new and used vehicles, with MG dealers catering to the latter.

articles.title: MG ZS getting update to fix performance issue
articles.author: Max Davies
articles.summary: MG is rolling out a software update for its updated MG ZS Hybrid+ model, less than two months after its launch in Australia. The update addresses a powertrain issue.

articles.title: AI Speech-to-Code Startup StackBlitz Is in Talks for a $700 Million Valuation
articles.author: Arno Schütze
articles.summary: StackBlitz Inc. is finalizing talks to raise $83.5 million after launching its new AI product, Bolt.new, in October. Bolt.new, a platform that uses AI to help build websites, has attracted nearly 1 million monthly users and generated tens of millions in annual recurring revenue, contributing to the company's significant growth.

articles.title: I tested 6 budget bread mixers to see which makes the perfect dough – an Argos buy is a baker's dream
articles.author: Julie Cook
articles.summary: Several stand mixers are reviewed, including the Scandi (available at Asda for £45), the Tower 3 in 1 (£82.99), the Dunelm (£55), the Daewoo (£59.99), the George (Asda, £45), and the Cookworks (£80).  The reviews assess features like design, noise level, dough-making ability, and overall value, giving potential buyers insights into their performance and suitability for different kitchen sizes and needs.

articles.title: I tested 6 budget bread mixers to see which makes the perfect dough – an Argos buy is a baker's dream
articles.author: Julie Cook
articles.summary: The article reviews several stand mixers from brands like Asda (Scandi), Wayfair (Tower 3 in 1), Dunelm, Currys (Daewoo), and Argos (Cookworks). The reviews cover design, features, dough-making performance, value, and noise levels, providing insights for consumers looking to purchase a new mixer. Prices range from £45 to £82.99.

articles.title: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero DLC: See Release Date, Time and Characters
articles.author: The Feed
articles.summary: Bandai Namco is releasing the Hero of Justice DLC for Dragon Ball Sparking Zero on January 23, 2025, with early access for Season Pass holders on January 21, 2025. The DLC includes 11 new playable characters from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie and three custom battles.

articles.title: Truegenics Revolutionizes Customer Service with AI Assistant 'Madison', Achieving 76% Automation Rate in Digital Transformation Journey
articles.author: Singapore
articles.summary: Truegenics Pte Ltd has launched 'Madison', an AI customer service system capable of handling over 76% of daily customer inquiries. This system demonstrates faster response times and accuracy while maintaining high customer satisfaction. The company plans to expand its AI capabilities beyond operational efficiency, exploring data analytics and personalized customer experience enhancements.

articles.title: Xinhua Headlines: What to expect as China's local authorities plan for 2025 economy
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Several Chinese regions are embracing the "debut economy" to stimulate consumption and innovation. Shanghai is focusing on becoming a hub for new product launches and flagship stores. Guangzhou plans to attract new product launches and "first stores" by offering incentives and streamlining approval processes.

articles.title: UGG just dropped new Tazz Sunwave platform slipper and its selling fast
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: UGG has launched the Tazz Sunwave platform slipper, an upgraded version of the popular Tazz Slipper. The new slipper features a striped design resembling the sun, a suede upper, and a sugarcane EVA outsole with a 1.75" platform. The 'Mustard Seed' color is available in sizes 5-12, though some sizes are already sold out.

articles.title: Truegenics Revolutionizes Customer Service with AI Assistant ‘Madison', Achieving 76% Automation Rate in Digital Transformation Journey
articles.summary: Truegenics Pte Ltd has launched 'Madison,' an AI-powered customer service system that automates 76% of customer inquiries, leading to significant efficiency gains. The AI system provides superior response times and accuracy, enhancing the customer experience. Truegenics aims to expand its AI capabilities for data analytics, predictive analysis, and personalized customer experiences.

articles.title: The ever-flexible Samsung is knocking on the door. It will arrive earlier than we expected
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch four new foldable devices, including the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip 7, a more affordable Galaxy Z Flip FE, and a new device featuring the innovative Flex G technology. The Flex G device boasts an inward-folding design that can unfold to a 12.4-inch display or partially open to a 10.5-inch display, and it is expected to be unveiled in early July.

articles.title: Shoppers say this Black+Decker stick vacuum, down to $88, is 'just as good' as a Dyson
articles.author: Britt Ross
articles.summary: Black+Decker launched the PowerSeries+ 16V Max Cordless Stick Vacuum, a lightweight, cordless vacuum with features like AutoSense Technology and an anti-tangle brush bar, available on Amazon. The product can convert into a handheld vacuum. Joymoop also launched a Mop with nifty wash chamber and wringing system, and a 360° mophead.

articles.title: Funding fueling growth for Proper Good
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Proper Good is accelerating product development and operations. They are also enhancing customer offerings.

articles.title: From Cleaner to CEO: The Inspiring Journey of Alfred Challis at MANZI Water
articles.author: Admin135
articles.summary: MANZI Water recently celebrated the opening of its 105th outlet in South Africa. The company is committed to providing high-quality, affordable water solutions, focusing on sustainability and community engagement. MANZI Water offers a wide range of beverages and eco-friendly water refill solutions.

articles.title: Target has Joanna and Chip Gaines' GE Profile Opal Nugget Ice Maker on sale for ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Target is offering a price drop on the GE nugget ice maker. This provides updated product information from GE, although it focuses on the price rather than a new product introduction.

articles.title: When can I buy the Nintendo Switch 2?
articles.author: Victoria Rosenthal
articles.summary: Nintendo is expected to launch the Nintendo Switch 2 potentially in June 2025, featuring a larger LCD screen, full-width kickstand, and larger Joy-Con controllers. The console will offer backward compatibility with many Nintendo Switch games and may include exclusive titles like 'Mario Kart 9'. Prior to the Nintendo Switch 2 release, discounts on the Nintendo Switch 1 models are expected.

articles.title: Yeti Just Re-Released an Elusive, Affordable Cult Favorite
articles.author: Steve Mazzucchi
articles.summary: Yeti has re-released its Rambler Pour Over coffee product, previously sold out after its initial launch. The Rambler Pour Over, priced at $30, features double-wall insulation, stainless steel construction, and is designed to work with Yeti tumblers and mugs.

articles.title: Shoppers snap up 'brilliant' Dyson and Shark rivalling £570 vacuum reduced by eye-watering amount
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Halo Capsule X, a lightweight vacuum cleaner with a bagged design holding up to two liters of waste, is currently available for purchase. It features an interchangeable battery providing up to an hour of runtime on a single charge.  Customer reviews highlight its effective dirt pickup, while mentioning concerns about battery life and the long-term availability of replacement bags.

articles.title: 7 free tools to help you migrate data to a new PC or laptop
articles.author: João Carrasqueira
articles.summary: The article highlights several tools, including Mega cloud storage with its 20GB free plan, Windows Package Manager (winget) included in Windows 11, EaseUS Todo PCTrans for migrating files and applications, AOMEI Backupper Standard for backing up entire partitions, and Clonezilla for cloning drives. These tools aid in setting up new PCs by facilitating file transfers, application re-installation, and data migration, offering solutions ranging from simple file sharing to complete system cloning.

articles.title: In 2025 brands have to do… betterer
articles.author: Lauren Mcnamara
articles.summary: LG addressed market trends by reassuring customers with a campaign for their new OLEDs: "Our best. Now even better." Papa John's promotes "Better ingredients. Better Pizza." Telstra highlighted improved network coverage in regional Australia through a campaign emphasizing a "better network."

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the hard candy will drop
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso has launched a new product called "Soup Drops," chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candies, marketed as "soup you can suck on." The first batch sold out quickly, and Progresso plans to release additional drops weekly throughout January. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup and the candy for $2.49 plus shipping.

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the soup-flavored candy will drop
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso launched Soup Drops, a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy. The first batch sold out quickly, and additional weekly releases are planned. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup and costs $2.49 plus shipping.

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the hard candy will drop
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso launched Soup Drops, a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, packaged in a can resembling their soup cans. Each order includes a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup and Soup Drops for $2.49 plus shipping. Additional drops will be released weekly through January.

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the hard candy will drop
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso launched a new product called "Soup Drops," a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, which sold out quickly after its initial release. The "Soup You Can Suck On" drops taste like broth, savory veggies, soft egg noodles, and a hint of parsley, packaged in a can with 20 individually wrapped candies. Each order includes the candy drops and a can of Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup for $2.49 plus shipping.

articles.title: Progresso Soup Drops sell out soup-er fast: When more of the hard candy will drop
articles.author: Gabe Hauari
articles.summary: Progresso launched "Soup Drops," a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy, which sold out quickly. These drops are packaged in a can resembling Progresso soup and include a can of actual Progresso soup for $2.49. Additional weekly releases are planned for the rest of January.

articles.title: Borghese—and Its Iconic '80s Mud Mask—Is Making a Comeback, Starting in Dallas
articles.author: Caitlin Clark
articles.summary: Borghese, a skincare company, is expanding its retail presence by introducing its existing product line, including the Fango Active Mud Mask, cleansers, vitamin C capsules, and shower gels, to Neiman Marcus. This move aims to reach their target customer base of women aged 30 to 70 in physical retail locations.

articles.title: OPPO launches Reno13 series in India
articles.author: Gk News Service
articles.summary: OPPO India has launched its Reno13 Series 5G smartphones, featuring AI-powered cameras and a MediaTek Dimensity 8350 processor. The Reno13 has a 50MP primary sensor, a 6.59-inch OLED display, and 80W SUPERVOOC fast-charging, with prices starting at `37,999. The series is available through retail outlets, OPPO's e-Store, and Flipkart.

articles.title: Dress that's 'perfect' from winter to spring is 55% off
articles.author: Sarah Lumley
articles.summary: Seasalt Cornwall's Sea Strewn Midi Dress, made from 100% organic cotton, is on sale for £29.95, reduced from £65.95. Available in sizes 8-18 and in Regular and Tall fits, the dress features a floral pattern, side pockets, and is machine washable. Customer reviews indicate it is warm, comfortable, and versatile.

articles.title: Polar Seltzer unveils new ‘Dessert Cart' flavors, including ‘apple crisp' and ‘cinnamon bun'
articles.summary: The company launched a new small-batch collection called 'Dessert Cart', featuring sparkling avatars free of sugar, dairy, and gluten. The flavors are designed to provide a sensory, effervescent dessert experience. The new flavors are reportedly already available in stores, though official availability details have not been announced.

articles.title: Boots shoppers praise £4 shampoo that's 'brilliant' for anyone with grey hair
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Noughty has introduced the Detox Dynamo Clarifying Shampoo, a 97% natural blend aimed at detoxifying hair and scalp. The shampoo uses sugar beet extract to condition hair and peppermint extract to purify and hydrate it. User reviews indicate its effectiveness in removing product buildup, although some find the formula difficult to apply.

articles.title: Omneky Launches on AWS Marketplace
articles.author: Omneky
articles.summary: Omneky has made its AI-powered advertising solutions platform available on AWS Marketplace. This allows AWS customers to easily deploy and scale Omneky's solutions for ad creative optimization and campaign performance enhancement. AWS customers in the Enterprise Discount Program can also access discounts on the Omneky platform.

articles.title: Ooredoo's new campaign showcases an upgraded telecom experience
articles.summary: Ooredoo has launched a new marketing campaign featuring entertaining commercials to showcase its network strength and highlight the improved connectivity experience it offers. The campaign aims to resonate with users by addressing common connectivity struggles and presenting Ooredoo as the solution for a seamless online experience, specifically targeting the gaming community.

articles.title: A Month With the World's Most Expensive Robot Vacuum Cleaner
articles.summary: Roborock has launched the S8 MaxV Ultra Drain and Refill, a high-end robot vacuum and mop combo with features like AI obstacle detection, self-emptying dirt bin, and a self-washing mop. The device requires installation, including plumbing for water and drainage, and is priced at $1,900 (reduced to $1,600 at the time of review). While praised for its polished performance and features, it still faces limitations common to robot cleaners, such as getting stuck and imperfect stain removal.

articles.title: Sainsbury's customers go wild for new cinnamon product – but some are confused
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: All Things Butter, a British brand, has launched a new Cinnamon Bun Butter. This butter, priced at £2.95 for 125g, blends creamy butter, cinnamon, sugar, and lemon. It is available at Sainsbury's, Asda and Ocado.

articles.title: Give the gift of new designer perfumes with ScentBox this Valentine's Day
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: ScentBox offers a fragrance subscription service with options like Standard, Premium, and Platinum memberships. Each tier provides access to a different range of designer fragrances, including brands like Giorgio Armani and Versace, with introductory pricing available for the first month. Members receive a 30-day supply of their chosen fragrance in a travel-sized atomizer.

articles.title: Give the gift of new designer perfumes with ScentBox this Valentine's Day
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: ScentBox is promoting its fragrance subscription service, offering monthly deliveries of men's and women's scents in travel sizes. The service provides access to various designer fragrances from brands like Giorgio Armani, Versace, and L'Occitane through tiered membership options with different pricing and access to standard, premium, and platinum fragrances. Introductory offers are available for the first month of each tier.

articles.title: Give the gift of new designer perfumes with ScentBox this Valentine's Day
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: ScentBox is promoting its fragrance subscription service as a Valentine's Day gift, offering monthly deliveries of men's and women's scents in refillable travel sizes. The company provides different membership tiers that include a range of fragrances from brands such as Giorgio Armani, Versace, and Cartier.

articles.title: Give the gift of new designer perfumes with ScentBox this Valentine's Day
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: ScentBox, a fragrance subscription brand, introduces affordable membership options for Valentine's Day, delivering travel-sized scents from brands like Giorgio Armani and Versace. The service allows customers to discover new fragrances without purchasing full-size bottles.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025 – live: What to expect
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil its Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked event in San Jose. The Galaxy S25 Ultra is expected to feature a new design, a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a larger display, and a 50MP ultra-wide camera. There might also be a surprise announcement of an all-new S25 Slim model.

articles.title: How to clean your washing machine in five simple steps
articles.author: Debora Robertson
articles.summary: Dr Beckmann's offers Service-it Deep Clean Washing Machine Cleaner. This product is used to deep clean washing machines. The article also describes alternative cleaning methods using vinegar and bicarbonate of soda.

articles.title: 11 Beauty Companies That Contributed to Tower 28's L.A. Wildfire Relief Event
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Tower 28, YSE Beauty, Supergoop, OUAI, Summer Fridays, OSEA, Loops, T3, Dae, Lanolips and Kate Somerville donated products to a relief effort. Highlighted products include Tower 28's SOS line, YSE Beauty's Xtremely Rich Moisturizer, Supergoop's Unseen Sunscreen, OUAI's Leave-In Conditioner, Summer Fridays' Jet Lag Mask, OSEA's Undaria Algae Body Wash, Loops Face Masks, T3 Airluxe Hair Dryer, Dae Signature Shampoo, Lanolips Multipurpose Superbaum, and Kate Somerville Goat Milk Cleanser, each offering unique benefits for skincare and haircare.

articles.title: How to become a learning machine
articles.author: Rajat Paharia
articles.summary: The article highlights the challenges companies face when launching new products and services, emphasizing the importance of iteration and learning from customer feedback. It mentions that Ask Steve is a Chrome extension that adds AI capabilities to websites. Companies should launch sooner with a minimum viable product (MVP) and test their prototypes to identify and address key risks for success.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland fans rushing to buy Dyson hair dryer dupe in middle aisle – it comes in three colours and is €300 cheaper
articles.author: Jamie Smith
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching the Visage Ionic Hair Dryer on January 26th, priced at €16.99. The product, available in three colors, is positioned as a dupe for the Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer, featuring three temperature and two-speed settings along with concentrator and diffuser attachments.

articles.title: Goodwillfinds Launches AI-Powered Customer Service Chatbot named ‘Gem'
articles.summary: Goodwillfinds launched Gem, a new AI-powered customer service chatbot developed with OpenAI, to enhance customer support. Gem provides immediate and personalized assistance 24/7, handling product inquiries, order status, returns, and general information. Since its launch late last year, Gem now handles over 60% of inbound customer contacts.

articles.title: Oildash Revolutionizes Energy Services With Mobile App for Oil and HVAC Deliveries in Tri-State Area
articles.author: ACCESSWIRE
articles.summary: Oildash launched a new mobile application that offers consumers instant price comparisons, real-time tracking, and no-contract flexibility for oil and HVAC services. The innovative app aims to provide users with convenient and transparent access to these services.

articles.title: ‘Zyra Protein' Launches First Ever Plant-Based Protein Powder with Just Four Ingredients
articles.summary: West Family Ventures LLC has announced the launch of Zyra Protein Powder, a new plant-based nutritional supplement. Zyra Protein Powder contains pea protein, date sugar, strawberry powder, and salt, and will be available online, through independent retailers, and on Amazon.

articles.title: ‘The only upright I would buy would be a…': Expert says never buy a Bissell, Hoover, or Dirt Devil at Walmart. Then he shows the only vacuum he'd bring home
articles.author: Braden Bjella
articles.summary: A vacuum expert recommends the Shark Navigator Lift-Away vacuum, available at Walmart for $164, as the best option, advising against models with self-cleaning brush rolls, power fins, or dual brush rolls. The New York Times' Wirecutter section has also consistently recommended this Shark model for almost a decade, calling it 'the best under-$200 model you can buy.'

articles.title: Aldi Ireland shoppers rush to tills for dupe over €420 cheaper than luxury rival
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Visage Iconic Hairdryer, retailing for €16.99, as a cheaper alternative to Dyson's Supersonic Hair Dryer. The hairdryer features three heat settings, two-speed settings, an Ionic function and three trendy colors. Additionally, Aldi launched a 6.2L Air Fryer, offering a cost-effective alternative to the Ninja 9.5 Litre Foodi Max Zone Air Fryer.

articles.title: Sainsbury's 'intriguing' new product has some shoppers confused about how to use it
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: Sainsbury's is now selling "Cinnamon Bun Butter", a cinnamon-flavored spread for £2.95 per 125g. New Foods UK revealed it on Instagram, sparking both excitement and uncertainty among shoppers regarding its culinary applications. All Things Butter produces it using handcrafted traditions.

articles.title: Kojie San Soap 101: Everything You Need to Know Before Buying
articles.author: Gloria Adesanya
articles.summary: Kojie San brand created the Kojie San Soap. The soap contains kojic acid, derived from fermented rice or mushrooms. It targets uneven skin tone, dark spots, and hyperpigmentation.

articles.title: Revolutionising Marketing Strategies with AI Platforms
articles.author: Nathan Spears
articles.summary: The AI marketing platform enhances marketing strategies with AI-driven solutions. It unlocks insights, optimizes campaigns, maximizes ROI, and increases efficiency in promotional campaigns. This platform uses predictive analytics, automation, and personalized recommendations.

articles.title: What Came First, Sliced Bread Or The Pop-Up Toaster?
articles.author: Joe Hoeffner
articles.summary: In 1921, Charles Strite patented the Toastmaster, a toaster capable of toasting both sides of a slice and ejecting the bread automatically. This new toaster quickly gained popularity in commercial kitchens, followed by a home version, and remarkably, modern toasters still operate on similar principles.

articles.title: Stocks in play: Simply Better Brands Corp.
articles.author: Baystreet.ca
articles.summary: TRUBAR TM has launched its product, TRUBAR TM, on Gopuff, a leading instant commerce platform in major U.S. markets. This launch strengthens TRUBAR TM's presence in the e-commerce channel and introduces the brand to Gopuff customers seeking healthy snacking options with fast delivery.

articles.title: The Power of Simplicity: Why User-Friendly Interfaces Are Critical for AI Adoption
articles.author: Brian Wang
articles.summary: SingularityNET launched the UI Sandbox, a web application designed to simplify the creation of user-friendly interfaces for AI services. This platform offers tools like real-time previews, custom component libraries, and multiple SDK options. The UI Sandbox aims to make AI more accessible by providing developers with the means to build intuitive interfaces.

articles.title: 'Great bang for the buck': This waterproof speaker is down to $20 for a limited time
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: The BolaButty Bluetooth Speaker is available on Amazon, featuring long battery life, built-in lighting effects, and water resistance. Currently, a Lightning Deal offers the speaker for $20. It can connect up to 100 feet away and has a built-in microphone for hands-free calling.

articles.title: Aldi quietly launches two new scents in Molton Brown candle dupe range – and they're ...
articles.author: The Sun
articles.summary: Aldi has launched two new scents to its Molton Brown candle dupe range. These new scents aim to add fragrance to homes.

articles.title: Unique Valentine's Day gift ideas that aren't chocolate or flowers
articles.author: Randi Mann
articles.summary: Several companies are featured with their new products and services. Silk & Snow offers Percale Cotton Core Sheets Bundle, Mejuri presents Pavé Diamond Wishbone Necklace, MeUndies promotes matching undies, Theragun features Theragun mini, and Fable offers Wine Glasses. Also, The Adventure Challenge provides Couple's Edition and Indigo sells Onyx Storm (Deluxe Limited Edition).

articles.title: Ozobot Revolutionizes Education with Ari, the App-Powered Robot
articles.author: Ozobot
articles.summary: Ozobot's Ari, a new app-driven robot designed for STEAM education, is now available for purchase. Shipping to customers in the United States and internationally will begin in March 2025.

articles.title: Grindr Unveils 2025 Product Roadmap, Including Six New Intent-Based Travel and AI Personalization Products
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Grindr Inc. unveiled its product roadmap for 2025, which includes new products and features. These enhancements will expand user intents and use cases, including improved personalization and travel features within the Grindr app.

articles.title: SIMPLY BETTER BRANDS CORP. ANNOUNCES EXPANDED DISTRIBUTION OF TRUBAR™ IN THE E-COMMERCE CHANNEL WITH GOPUFF
articles.author: Simply Better Brands Corp
articles.summary: Simply Better Brands Corp. has launched TRUBAR TM on Gopuff, a leading instant commerce platform in the U.S.  This launch expands TRUBAR TM's presence in the e-commerce channel, offering a "Better-For-You" nutrition brand to Gopuff customers seeking healthy snacks with fast delivery.

articles.title: Bazic Instinct Elevates Luxury Fashion Resale with Premium Collection and Signature Service
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: Bazic Instinct introduced its curated New Year collection, showcasing rare and sought-after luxury pieces authenticated for quality. The company also enhanced its 'La Conciergerie' service, a luxury care program offering meticulous cleaning and personalized consultation for high-end bags, setting new standards in luxury care and resale innovation.

articles.title: China's provincial-level regions to boost economy, consumption through debut economy in 2025
org: School of Economics of Jilin University
articles.summary: Several Chinese provinces, including Jilin, Shanghai, Guangdong, Hunan, and Heilongjiang, are focusing on the "debut economy" to attract first stores and launch new products and services. Shanghai saw 1,173 first stores open from January to November 2024, while Beijing had 900, and Guangdong attracted over 800. These initiatives aim to boost consumption, diversify product and service offerings, and drive industrial development.

articles.title: Dyson's 'most powerful' V8 vacuum ideal for large homes and pet owners - now £100 cheaper
articles.author: Harriet Morphy-Morris
articles.summary: Dyson is offering £100 off its V8 Advanced vacuum cleaner, which features a 40-minute run time and cordless design. The package includes attachments and a docking station. A similar product from INTETURE is available on Amazon.

articles.title: Aldi quietly launches two new scents in Molton Brown candle dupe range – and they're already on shelves
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: Aldi has launched two new scents, Rose, Rhubarb and Musk and Sea Salt and Fennel, to its Hotel Collection Luxury Aroma Candle range, priced at £5.99. The retailer also introduced Hotel Collection Luxury Aromas Reed Diffusers available in the same scents and costing £5.99, offering an affordable alternative to Molton Brown products.

articles.title: 'The best hair dryer I've ever used has £50 off in January sale'
articles.author: Phoebe Barton Lifestyle
articles.summary: Bellissima Italia launched the Gemini Hair Dryer, which boasts a swivel handle, multiple styling attachments, 1400 W power, and Ionic Technology. The hair dryer has three speeds, three heat temperatures, a cool air shot button and a Memory Function. The product is also lightweight with a 2.5-meter cord, and customers are reporting smooth and shiny hair with minimal static.

articles.title: Sainsbury's shoppers desperate to try 'intriguing' product – but don't know how to use it
articles.author: Jess Flaherty
articles.summary: All Things Butter launched a new 'Cinnamon Bun Butter,' which is available at Sainsbury's for £2.95 for a 125g slab and also at Asda and Ocado. The product, created by British brand All Things Butter, has garnered attention on social media, with New Foods UK spotting it and shoppers sharing suggestions on how to use it.

articles.title: Cheapest car in Portugal to have 100% electric version
articles.summary: Dacia plans to launch a 100% electric version of the Sandero in 2027. The electric Sandero will maintain the CMF-B platform, potentially using technologies similar to Renault 5 or Alpine A290, and Dacia commits to making it affordable.

articles.title: BrandSpark International announces its 22nd annual 2025 Best New Product Awards winners, recognizing the Best New Food, Beverage, Beauty, Health, Personal Care, Kids, Pet, Household Care, Home Goods, Quick Service Restaurant Menu Items and Services based on a nationwide survey of Canadian consumers
articles.author: Best New Product Awards Inc
articles.summary: BrandSpark International announced the winners of the 2025 Best New Product Awards, highlighting innovative products and services across 118 categories.  Winning products include Strong Roots Plant-Based Frozen Food, Violife Creamy Block, Enjoy! Plant-Based Milks, KFC Snacker Wraps, and Neo World Elite Mastercard.

articles.title: 'Absolute game-changing' Philips gadget keeps winter jackets and coats pristine
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: A 'specially designed shaver' is introduced for removing bobbles from garments, featuring USB charging, a 90-minute run time, and an easily removable container for sheared fabric. It has received positive reviews on Amazon, with customers praising its effectiveness and build quality, while some noted challenges with the waste container.

articles.title: Samsung is paying these shoppers �200 to change their smartwatch
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Samsung offers a trade-in program allowing customers to exchange their old watches for a discount of 200 on Samsung's current best Smart Watch.

articles.title: Tachyon Technologies Inaugurates Global Delivery Centre in Hyderabad
articles.author: The Hans India
articles.summary: Tachyon Technologies launched its Global Delivery Centre in Hyderabad to deliver IT solutions in areas like SAP, Salesforce, AI, and data analytics. The company plans to hire 500 professionals to support this expansion and aims to achieve $1 billion in revenue over the next decade. This new center is designed to enhance service quality and cater to existing and new clients in various global markets.

articles.title: Truegenics Revolutionizes Customer Service with AI Assistant 'Madison', Achieving 76% Automation Rate in Digital Transformation Journey
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Truegenics Pte Ltd launched 'Madison,' an AI customer service system that automates 76% of inquiries, marking a digital transformation milestone. 'Madison' combines product knowledge and company policies for fast, consistent, accurate responses. Truegenics is also exploring advanced data analytics to optimize decision-making and enhance personalized customer experiences.

articles.title: Ninja device 'saves hours in the kitchen' and even 'cleans itself' - save £30 on Amazon
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Ninja has introduced a soup maker that is receiving positive feedback from users. The soup maker is praised for its ease of use, self-cleaning function, and ability to create multiple portions of soup. Amazon reviews indicate users find it a valuable investment for homemade meals.

articles.title: CJ OliveNetworks launches integrated AI platform
articles.author: 젊은베르의 구독뉴스
articles.summary: CJ OliveNetworks has launched OneFlow AI, an integrated AI platform designed for managing enterprise digital transformation. The platform provides end-to-end integration from AI model development to API deployment and post-service monitoring, featuring a user-friendly interface and customized services for various industries.

articles.title: Your iPhone will look like a brick next to 'world's thinnest' new phone
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Oppo is teasing the launch of its next flagship foldable phone, the Find N5, emphasizing that it will be 'the world's thinnest folding flagship'. The Find N5 boasts dramatically thinner design compared to existing phones, improved waterproof performance with IPX6, IPX8, and IPX9 ratings, and is set to launch in China next month.

articles.title: Aldi's €50 vacuum cleaner is a dupe for €250 Dyson and arrives in stores this week
articles.author: Michelle Townsend
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Cyclonic Stick Vacuum Cleaner, a budget-friendly alternative to the Dyson V8 advanced vacuum, on January 23rd. The vacuum cleaner, available in two colors, features an LED display, detachable dust tank, and a 140W motor, costing €50 compared to Dyson's €299.99.

articles.title: Last chance! Save up to $1,250 ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.author: Louis Ramirez
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series at the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event. Preorders starting January 22 offer up to $1,250 in savings, including credits for reserving and preordering, trade-in options, and a potential gift card. The new lineup includes the Galaxy S25, S25 Plus, and S25 Ultra, with the Ultra model expected to have significant camera improvements.

articles.title: Top Tech: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra price falls up to £195 ahead of S25 launch
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil its Galaxy S25 range at the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22. Prior to the launch, retailers are offering deals on the older Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, with discounts available at Amazon, Mobiles.co.uk, and directly from Samsung.

articles.title: Transforming Web Development: Exploring the Benefits of an AI Website Creator
articles.author: Busines Newswire
articles.summary: Closer is introducing an AI website creator platform empowering businesses to easily create sophisticated websites. The platform offers features such as AI-driven design suggestions, real-time editing, and third-party integrations. It aims to provide a cost-effective and efficient solution for establishing a compelling online presence.

articles.title: ⚡ROG Phone 9 Fan Edition To Launch Soon With Lower Price; Check Expected Specifications and Features
articles.summary: ASUS is expected to launch ROG Phone 9 FE soon in select markets. The phone will feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 and will be offered at a lower price. Specifications and features of the new phone are anticipated.

articles.title: POCO X7 Honest Review: What You Need to Know Before Buying
articles.summary: The POCO X7 smartphone is being reviewed, focusing on its design, performance, camera, and battery. The review aims to determine if the smartphone's features justify its price.

articles.title: Driving Innovation in Marketing Analytics: Manoj Gudala Leads Development of Cutting-Edge Consumer Segmentation Tool
articles.summary: Manoj Gudala leads the development of a new consumer segmentation tool designed to automate consumer analysis, providing marketing teams with faster, more intuitive insights. The tool integrates diverse data sources and offers user-friendly dashboards, enabling more informed and agile marketing strategies.

articles.title: POCO X7 Pro Review: Is It Really Worth the Hype? Let's Find Out!
articles.summary: POCO X7 Pro is being reviewed to determine if its features and performance justify the hype. The video provides an in-depth look at the phone to assess its worthiness.

articles.title: Samsung rumoured to launch four foldable smartphones in 2025, including tri-fold model
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung plans to launch four foldable smartphones in 2025: the Galaxy Z Flip 7, Galaxy Z Fold 7, Galaxy Z Flip FE, and a tri-fold model featuring a 9.9 to 10-inch display. The Galaxy S25 series will be launched at Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, 2025.

articles.title: Holstail used in the European imperial family, Icelandic Sea Cells made from Icelandic seaweed, and ..
articles.author: Lee Yu-jin
articles.summary: Ace Bed launched the premium mattress Heritz Black with exotic materials. Sealy Bed released the 'Celebratory Flush' mattress with super soft and memory foam and will focus on it's Crown Jewel collection. Shinsegae Casa introduced the 'Materaso Forest Cloud H' mattress using Holstail. N32 expanded its product lineup to include bedding such as pillows and blankets, and added linen jacquard fabric to improve heat sensitivity of mattresses.

articles.title: I tried spreadable coffee, it is the new Marmite
articles.author: Jonathan Wells
articles.summary: No Normal Coffee has launched a spreadable coffee paste made with Fairtrade Colombian arabica and organic Swiss beet sugar. The product, packaged in a tube for portability, has already won an innovation award at ISPO and is being shipped internationally. It's designed for outdoor use and can also be used in various recipes.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy Slim Launch on January 22? Know What To Expect From Samsung Galaxy Unpacked Event
articles.summary: Samsung will launch its Galaxy S25 series on January 22 at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The launch includes the Samsung Galaxy S25, Samsung Galaxy S25+, and Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra. The Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim might also be launched.

articles.title: Samsung teases new way to interact with mobile through hologram experience ahead of Galaxy Unpacked 2025
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics showcased live holograms in London to preview Galaxy Unpacked 2025. The projections hint at intuitive Galaxy AI mobile experiences and new features coming to the next Galaxy S series.

articles.title: Soup You Can Suck On: Introducing Progresso Soup Drops
articles.author: News Release
articles.summary: General Mills, via its Progresso brand, is launching a limited-edition product called Progresso Soup Drops, which are hard candies with the flavor of Progresso Chicken Noodle Soup. They will be available exclusively on ProgressoSoupDrops.com starting January 16th and cost $2.49 plus shipping, including a can of actual Progresso Traditional Chicken Noodle Soup.

articles.title: Thread by @TedCruz1072676 on Thread Reader App
articles.summary: ChatGPT can be used to write a launch speech for a product or business. The prompt allows users to highlight company values and address a problem. This can aid in the introduction of new products or services.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25's free Galaxy AI access may only last until 2025 ends
articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy S25 series, featuring new additions like Now Bar, Daily Briefing, Night Video with Audio Eraser, and ProScaler exclusively for the Ultra model. The lineup will also include improvements to selfie processing for more natural-looking results, while maintaining free access to Galaxy AI through 2025.

articles.title: The strange reason this summer essential might be getting more expensive
articles.author: Cassidy Pearce
articles.summary: Hey Bud Skincare is advocating against a proposed tax change in Australia that would affect multi-purpose sunscreens like their Serving Shade SPF50. They argue that sunscreens are essential for protection against UV rays and skin cancer and should be accessible. Hey Bud Skincare created Serving Shade to encourage daily use of sunscreen.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Unpacked 2025: The next big leap in mobile AI experiences
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the new Galaxy S series at Unpacked on January 22 in San Jose. This new series will feature the next evolution of Galaxy AI, designed to offer more natural and intuitive interactions. The launch aims to set a new standard for mobile AI experiences.

articles.title: Ogilvy Singapore Enjoys a Big Night at the Creative Circle Awards
articles.author: Bobis The Founder
articles.summary: Vaseline won Advertiser of the Year. Ogilvy Singapore won awards for Vaseline's Transition Body Lotion and Shea Moisture's The Visa Loophole.

articles.title: With Meta and Bajaj Electronics as clients, Starbuzz.ai is redefining influencer marketing with data-driven solutions
articles.author: Your Story
articles.summary: Starbuzz.ai, based in Hyderabad, is an AI-powered influencer marketing platform. It has served over one lakh influencers and 300 brands, including Meta, Yamaha, Bajaj Electronics, and Visa Beauty.

articles.title: AI has been mediocre on smartphones, but Samsung can change the narrative with Galaxy AI
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil the Galaxy S25 series with enhanced Galaxy AI features, aiming to differentiate itself from competitors like Apple. The company intends to drive sales through AI capabilities, building upon the initial AI features introduced in the Galaxy S24 series. The success of the S25 series will hinge on the consumer adoption of these AI features.

articles.title: Wonderful integrates tech and data as it expands into CX agency
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Wonderful is expanding into a full-service customer experience (CX) agency to meet growing client demand. The agency will offer services ranging across brand and performance marketing, experience design and technology implementation. Wonderful aims to leverage technology, including AI-powered automation, to optimize customer experiences and ensure interactions are relevant, engaging, and consistent.

articles.title: 5 replacements for Windows features that Microsoft abandoned
articles.author: Anurag Singh
articles.summary: Microsoft discontinued WordPad, recommending Microsoft Word or Windows Notepad instead and is phasing out Cortana, replacing it with Copilot AI.  Microsoft is also ending support for the Android subsystem in Windows 11, suggesting BlueStacks as an alternative. These actions impact the product offerings and services available from Microsoft and related companies.

articles.title: Revolutionising Sustainable Hair, Beard Care Solutions in Nigeria through Organic Hairoids
articles.author: Nigeria
articles.summary: Organic Hairoids is launching its sustainable, natural grooming products in Nigeria, including hair oils, beard balms, and oud fragrance oils. The company aims to cater to the growing demand for premium beard care products in Nigeria and create local opportunities through partnerships and training programs. This move signifies Organic Hairoids' expansion into Africa and its vision to empower individuals and communities with quality grooming solutions.

articles.title: Want To Treat Yourself For Valentine's Day? These Celestial-Inspired Vibrators Will Send You Into Orbit
articles.summary: Familiar recently launched a new line of celestial-inspired sex toys. The product line includes the Orbit Vibrating Personal Massager, the Aurora Duo G-Spot and Clitoral Stimulator Vibrator, and the Nebula Thrusting Wand.

articles.title: Where to buy Nvidia RTX 5080: UK/US links and prices
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nvidia launched the RTX 5080.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series launches on January 22: Specs, design, and AI features we expect
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung will launch its Galaxy S25 series on January 22, unveiling the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25 Plus, and Galaxy S25 Ultra models. A potential fourth model, the Samsung Galaxy S25 Slim, may also be introduced.

articles.title: Cyient secures multi-year deal from Deutsche Aircraft
articles.author: The Hindu
articles.summary: Cyient AI products will be embedded in a solution designed to support Deutsche Aircraft's global customer base. This collaboration introduces a new service leveraging AI technology for Deutsche Aircraft's clients.

articles.title: ‘Fallout 4', ‘Elden Ring' and more coming to Nintendo Switch 2, claims new report
articles.author: NME
articles.summary: Nintendo unveiled the Switch 2 console last week with a two-minute teaser focusing on the hardware. No games have been announced for the Switch 2 yet.

articles.title: Bobbi Brown has finally launched a Jones Road gel eyeliner – here's my honest review
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: A MUA brand updated its cult formula for its new brand, suggesting the launch of a new or updated product.

articles.title: Golden Chick returns to Lubbock, with 2nd location planned, here's the details
articles.author: Lubbock Avalanche-Journal
articles.summary: Progresso Soup launched a chicken noodle soup-flavored hard candy for a limited time during flu and cold season. This product is available for Walmart shoppers in South Lubbock.

articles.title: DJI Flip Drone Offers 48MP Photos And 4K Video Launched: Price, Features
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: DJI launched a new 4K drone. The drone can capture high-resolution photos. The drone delivers the photos in a small form factor.

articles.title: F.N.B. opens latest Pittsburgh branch, pilots new eStore concept
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: F.N.B. has opened a new branch featuring a novel concept that redefines its service approach. The branch introduces a unique twist on size and service along with offering sandwiches and salads.

articles.title: Ghanim partners with Jetsin for Abang J Satay launch in Brunei
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Ghanim International Corporation, in collaboration with Jetsin Sdn Bhd, has launched Ready-to-Cook Abang J Frozen Satay for the Brunei market. The satay, produced by Ghanim using Sabah recipes, was introduced at the 30th Consumer Fair and is available at a promotional price. This collaboration marks Ghanim's initial venture into manufacturing for an international brand.

articles.title: Elver Buds X: Indulge Unboxing
articles.author: Farhaan Tipu
articles.summary: Elver is unboxing its new TWS earbuds, BudsX. BudsX features a sleek design, superior sound quality, and cutting-edge features designed to enhance the user's audio experience.

articles.title: LIDL Kickstart programme open to Mayo food and drink producers
articles.summary: Lidl Ireland has opened applications for its 2025 Kickstart Supplier Development Programme, offering local food and drink producers the chance to have their products sold in Lidl stores. The programme, supported by Bord Bia, provides business support and guidance to help artisan producers break into the supermarket retail sector. Dublin-based Naked Bakes secured a permanent listing with Lidl Ireland after participating in the program.
